headline: KKR (NYSE:KKR) Explores US$10 Billion Sale Options For Atlantic Aviation
summary: KKR (NYSE:KKR) witnessed a 10% increase in its share price over the past week, a movement that coincides with ongoing developments around its potential $10 billion valuation for Atlantic Aviation amidst M&A rumors. Meanwhile, market-wide tensions due to U.S. export restrictions on chips did not deter KKR, likely due to its minimal exposure to the tech sector. The company's prospective acquisitions of Osttra Group and Karo Healthcare, coupled with board changes in the Middle East, further...

headline: The new way Wall Street giant Blackstone is trying to reach the investing masses
summary: Wall Street private equity giant Blackstone is teaming up with Vanguard and Wellington Management to get more private assets into the portfolios of everyday investors.
